title: September Rain
description: They slit his throat but he lived. That's what the townspeople said about the reclusive man they called Crazy Jake. When Jacob Chandler saved Hallie Greer from an attacker and was beaten half to death for his trouble, Hallie can't rest until she makes sure he's all right. Hallie travels up a treacherous mountain trail to a treeline cabin. What she finds there is danger, mystery and love.
author: Mallory Kane
